Tunable.name: CULLING_BUFFER_AMOUNT
Tunable.description: When relationships are culled from an NPC relationship tracker due to the number of relationships exceeding the cap, this is how much below the cap the number of relationships will be after the culling.

Tunable.name: PLAYED_NPC_REL_DEPTH_CULLING_THRESHOLD
Tunable.display: Played Npc Rel Depth Culling Threshold
Tunable.description: The relationship depth below which an NPC relationship will be culled. This is for sims that have been played in the past, but are not part of the active household now, and only operates on relationships with other NPCs.

Tunable.name: PLAYED_NPC_TO_PLAYED_NPC_MAX_RELATIONSHIPS
Tunable.display: Played Npc To Played Npc Max Relationships
Tunable.description: The max number of relationships that a played NPC is allowed to have with other NPCs. This is for sims that have been played in the past, but are not part of the active household now, and only operates on relationships with other NPCs.
